tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_node_info (
    node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    port INT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'Active'
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_node (node_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
node_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
node_ip VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
node_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE);

CREATE TABLE node_logs (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
node_id UUID,
log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_node(node_id));

CREATE TABLE node_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT,
    status_description TEXT,
    status_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_nodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE node_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_nodes(node_id)
);
CREATE TABLE node (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, node_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ip_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE block (block_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, node_id INTEGER NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES node(id));

CREATE TABLE transaction (transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, block_id INTEGER NOT NULL, from_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, to_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES block(block_id));
CREATE TABLE log (log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, node_id INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES node(id));

CREATE TABLE blockchain_nodes (
    node_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    node_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    node_ip_address INET NOT NULL,
    node_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE node_blocks (
    block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id UUID NOT NULL,
    block_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    block_size INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_nodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE node_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES node_blocks(block_id)
);

CREATE TABLE node_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id UUID NOT NULL,
    log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_nodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE node_endpoints (
    endpoint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id UUID NOT NULL,
    endpoint_url VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    endpoint_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    last_checked TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES blockchain_nodes(node_id)
);
